import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAccount } from "wagmi"; function RemoveLiquidityModel({ isOpen, setIsOpen, handleRemoveLiquidity }) { const { address } = useAccount(); return ( <>
setIsOpen(!isOpen)} className="text-sm text-blue-700 hover:underline dark:text-blue-500" > Add Liquidity?
); } export default RemoveLiquidityModel;
